thread.title: Woman set up date online 'to kill man and then eat his heart' | Metro News
thread.title_full: Woman set up date online 'to kill man and then eat his heart' | Metro News

author: Tomeyjes For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Woman set up date online 'to kill man and then eat his heart' | Metro News
text:
Toby Meyjes for Metro.co.uk Thursday 2 Feb 2017 9:43 pm Amy Caroline Brown has been arrested on suspicion of murder (Picture: KCPQ) 
A woman set up a date with a man she met online planning to kill him and then eat his heart, a police report claims. 
Amy Caroline Brown, 24, has been arrested on suspicion of murder after allegedly stabbing the man in the chest in a motel room in Lynwood, Washington. 
The 29-year-old alleged victim told officers he had met the woman through Craigslist, according to KTLA , but not for sex. 
However, the pair booked a room in a Rodeo Inn where the alleged assault took place. 
According to court documents, Brown had asked the man multiple times whether he was a serial killer to which he replied ‘No’.
